document_data.name: Helms
document_data.mainbody: The '''Helms''' were the city guard of [[Urmlaspyr]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Activities: The Helms patrolled the streets of Urmlaspyr and maintained the general order of the city. They also policed the roads outside of the city walls all the way to the [[Cormyr]]ean border marked by the [[River Lurlar]]. The waters of the [[Neck]] were patrolled with the Helms' 11 ships.
